message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that can bring a lot of value to your life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $8800. What do you think?
